data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 11,030 believers in Tongatapu, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tongatapu, Tonga
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Tongatapu.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 11,030 believers in the state of Tongatapu the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Tongatapu who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Vaini
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Vaini, Tongatapu, Tonga.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Tongatapu to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 56,360 people in the state of Tongatapu who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 11,030 believers in the state of Tongatapu the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
